metadata.name: POC NPCs - Elena and Aldric Only
metadata.description: Minimal POC: Elena and Aldric at Old Mill courtyard
metadata.author: Wayfarer Team

npcs.name: Elena
npcs.description: A young woman with flour still dusting her sleeves, worry etched in her brow. Her family's old mill holds mysteries she's not ready to confront alone.
npcs.personality: Determined but burdened by family secrets.

requests.name: Delivery to Farmer Aldric
requests.description: Elena needs grain seeds delivered to Aldric's farm beyond the creek. She'll pay well, and there might be more to this errand than meets the eye.

goals.name: Delivery + Investigation Offer
goals.description: Deliver the package and Elena shares something about the old mill

npcs.name: Farmer Aldric
npcs.description: A weathered farmer who tends his fields beyond the creek. He knew Elena's family before tragedy struck.
npcs.personality: Simple and direct. A man of few words but honest dealings.

requests.name: Casual chat
requests.description: Have a friendly conversation with Aldric
